description: MDTFANS /ILO - Creating Jobs - Capacity Building for Local Resource-based Road Works in Selected Districts in NAD and Nias

subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description:
1. The capacity of district  government and small-scale local contractors  in undertaking road works is satisfactory.
2. Techniques, standards, systems and strategies  for local resource-based road works are refined to conditions in Nanggroe Aceh Darusalam and Nias.
3. Community participation in rural road development and maintenance strengthened.
subproject.title: MDTFANS/ILO - Rural Roads

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description:
1. The capacity of district  government and small-scale local contractors  in undertaking road works is satisfactory.
2. Techniques, standards, systems and strategies  for local resource-based road works are refined to conditions in Nanggroe Aceh Darusalam and Nias.
3. Community participation in rural road development and maintenance strengthened.
subproject.title: MDTFANS/ILO - Rural Roads
